title: From crashes and mechanicals to gold: How junior women’s TT winner Wilson-Haffenden turned her worlds around
content:
The Australian crashed on the opening lap of the junior road race and a subsequent mechanical forced her to finish on a neutral service bike.

Read the full article at From crashes and mechanicals to gold: How junior women’s TT winner Wilson-Haffenden turned her worlds around on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
